channel.title: CVE Feed for QSige de IDM Sistemas -- QSige
channel.description: The latest CVEs for QSige de IDM Sistemas -- QSige

item.title: CVE-2023-4099|2024-08-02T07:17:12.142Z -- qsige%20de%20idm%20sistemas -- qsige
item.description: The QSige Monitor application does not have an access control mechanism to verify whether the user requesting a resource has sufficient permissions to do so. As a prerequisite, it is necessary to log into the application.

item.title: CVE-2023-4098|2024-08-02T07:17:11.898Z -- qsige%20de%20idm%20sistemas -- qsige
item.description: It has been identified that the web application does not correctly filter input parameters, allowing SQL injections, DoS or information disclosure. As a prerequisite, it is necessary to log into the application.
